Name: In Shape
About the game: In this minimalistic arcade game, you have to move along a winding plane and switch the shape of your figure to match the passing figures. Triangle, square and circle. For each figure passed, you get points and the movement gradually accelerates and the game becomes more difficult. Good luck.
